definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]

sentences.english: Ma Liang liked drawing very much.
The whole question of what is remembered in time is crucial to Maleonn.
sentences.chinese: 適時記住什麼東西，這個問題對於馬良來說至關重要。

sentences.english: Ma Liang went back to draw for the poor again.
sentences.chinese: 從此以後，馬良繼續用他的神筆幫窮人們畫畫。

sentences.english: Being the Theatre of Life is what reunites all Maleonn's photographic series.
sentences.chinese: “生活劇院”是馬良所有攝影系列的重新整合。

sentences.english: Ma Liang was a good boy. He helped people.
sentences.chinese: 馬良是一個善良的男孩，他幫助所有的人。

sentences.english: Ma Liang the Magic Brush is one of my favourite tales.
sentences.chinese: 《神筆馬良》是我最喜歡的童話之一。

sentences.english: Ma Liang used sticks to draw because he had no paintbrushes.
sentences.chinese: 馬良用小樹枝畫畫，因爲他沒有畫筆。

sentences.english: The bad man didn't have gold. So he painted gold with the magic paintbrush.
sentences.chinese: 有個不幫助別人的壞人，他把馬良的神筆拿走了。

sentences.english: Xuande read the letter and told Ma Liang to return.
sentences.chinese: 玄德看了書，便教馬良先回。

sentences.english: Precious horses are taken good care of here.
sentences.chinese: 寶馬良駒在這裏受到了加倍的呵護。

definition: Dongshi or Tungshih township in Chiayi county 嘉義縣|嘉义县[Jia1 yi4 xian4], west Taiwan
monstre sacré (i.e. artist famous for being deliberately preposterous)

lit. three humble visits to a thatched cottage/cf famous episode in the fictional Romance of Three Kingdoms 三國演義|三国演义 in which Liu Bei 劉備|刘备 recruits Zhuge Liang 諸葛亮|诸葛亮 (the Hidden Dragon 臥龍|卧龙) to his cause by visiting him three times
